pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulations and Statistical Inference for Linear Fractional Stable Motions // Contains functions for simulating the linear fractional stable motion according to the algorithm developed by Mazur and Otryakhin doi:10.32614/RJ-2020-008 based on the method from Stoev and Taqqu (2004) doi:10.1142/S0218348X04002379, as well as functions for estimation of parameters of these processes introduced by Mazur, Otryakhin and Podolskij (2018) arXiv:1802.06373, and also different related quantities.
